error.fetch_error: The source returned an invalid response. Please check the provided arguments and try again.
error.fetch_empty: The source returned an empty response. Please check the provided arguments and try again.

data_description.calendar_title: A more readable, or user-friendly, name for the waste calendar. If nothing is provided, the name returned by the source will be used.
data_description.separator: Used to join entries if the multiple values for a single day are returned by the source.
data_description.fetch_time: Representation of the time of day in 'HH:MM' that Home Assistant polls service provider for latest collection schedule.
data_description.random_fetch_time_offset: Randomly offsets the Fetch Time by up to x minutes. Can be used to distribute Home Assistant fetch commands over a longer time frame to avoid peak loads at service providers.
data_description.day_switch_time: Time of the day in 'HH:MM' that Home Assistant dismisses the current entry and moves to the next entry.

error.time_format: Please check the time fields. Times must be given in HH:MM format.
